title: Loving Colt
description: Alexis and Colt never planned on crossing paths.Alexis and her three year old daughter were running from their past and Colt was looking for his future. Neither planning to find salvation in one another. One night changed it allâ€¦And they had no hope of ever being the same again.Finding a way to make things work, when it feels like everything is against them, is something they will have to work hard to overcome. Will Colt be strong enough to handle Alexis's past?Or will it be too much?
author: C.A. Harms
